title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Data purge capabilities for Microsoft Teams content (GCC and DoD)
description:
,Extend data purge functionality to Microsoft Teams content to facilitate purge of sensitive or misplaced data. To track feature availability in GCC-High, see roadmap item 88975.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/search-and-delete-teams-chat-messages?view=o365-worldwide
